text: John Leslie "Les" Pabst (28 March 1917 – 12 May 1992) was a former Australian rules footballer who played with Hawthorn in the Victorian Football League (VFL). Between his two stints in the VFL, he served in the Australian Army during World War II. == Notes == == External links == * * Category:1917 births Category:1992 deaths Category:Australian rules footballers from Victoria (Australia) Category:Hawthorn Football Club players
title: Les Pabst
